nodes.text: The Edge Forest was a forest located on the southern coast of the continent Masara on the planet Tython. The Je'daii temple of Bodhi was located near the forest.

In her childhood, Lanoree Brock and her family lived close to this forest, and her parents enjoyed taking strolls to its boundaries. For Lanoree and her parents, the scenery was not just beautiful, but even more exhilarating because through the Force, they could keenly sense the primal essence of life that permeated through the myriad wildlife and flora that made this setting their home. But Lanoree's brother Dalien Brock who rejected the Force was unwilling to share the sensation. At the age of nine, he would always cry when they reached the borders of the forest due to his family's indifference towards his feelings.
